name: Keyboard Streak (2017)
description: Here is Keyboard Streak (2017) this a rhythm style game but using A,S,D and F keys to hit notes. There are no other consequences except for missing notes which will lead to failing the song after a certain time. The hitbox might be a bit funny in certain parts and also the meter on the right may not drop down or add precisely but I hope it's all good. I don't want to make the game to difficult in ways and too easy either but Enjoy :)
